title: Cesare Cremonini
subtitle: An overview on Cesare Cremonini's life and work.
curator: Miriam Longhitano, Laura Cigno, Anna Avona
description: This project will be about one of the best Italian singer songwriters from Bologna: Cesare Cremonini. He was of the best Italian singer-songwriters. As a substantial part of Italian culture, we will analyze his life and works.
